to telephone someone again, for example because they were not at home when you telephoned last time
Can you ask John to call me back when he gets in?
to return to a place you went to earlier
You could call back to collect her at noon.
to ask for something that you have lent or given to be paid or given back to you
In conditions of liquidity shortage they will call back these loans.
to telephone someone again, usually because one of you was not in or was busy at the time of the first call
No problem, I’ll call back later.
Can you ask him to call me back when he gets in?
to visit a person or place again in order to do something
I’ve got to do some shopping now. I’ll call back later for my order.
